page.title: 13Newperran Tourist Park
page.content: Newperran Tourist Park is between the villages of Goonhavern,Rejerrah and Rose. It is out in the country but quite near to the beaches of Perran- porth and Newquay. We visited this site in June. We saw 12 fields marked out for campers. It looked very clean with all the facilities campers would need. There are free heated swimming and paddling pools.There are swings, roundabouts,see-saws,slides,an adven- ture playground and a full size tractor to play on. There is a shop, cafe,off licence,baby rooms, launder- ette and a ladies hairdressing room. There is course fishing at Trevella. They have rules like all dogs are to be kept on leads, no noise after 10pm and a speed limit of 5m.p.h.There are lots of pubs nearby. It used to be a farm but the people make more money from having holiday makers.
